translated: If one conceives of a self, then there is beginning and end, arising from non-arising. From the causes of delusion, there are then karmic activities. From the causes of karmic activities, there is then consciousness. From the causes of consciousness, there are then name and form. From the causes of name and form, there are then the six sense bases. From the causes of the six sense bases, there is then contact. From the causes of contact, there is then feeling. From the causes of becoming, there is then birth. From the causes of birth, there are then old age, sickness, and death, with great suffering and distress gathering.
